TopicTitle: Gilbert's Spacecraft Materials: Habitat Module v0.1.1

Articles.Content:
Hello. My cat is Gilbert. He makes rocket parts.

I call him "Gilly-whompus." Sometimes, "Gilly gagillygagilly gilly gagilly." Sometimes, "Gil-baerdt."

He makes rocket parts for his company, Gilbert's Spacecraft Parts. Here is one of his first parts, the K-Hab.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Gilbert is sad, though. The airlock's getting the "Hatch is obstructed, can't exit" bug. Oh, dear, Gilbert, what to do.

If anyone wants this (if you do, use Crew Manifest so you don't trap your Kerbals inside the hab), I'll put up a download link soon.

Until then, good day!
This part is completely superfluous with the crewtank from the stock game, and the IVA is the same. Good part, but it does not do anything different.

Some criticism: The textures do not fit in with stock parts. The geometry and model look exactly like the normal hitchhiker. It could use some work because it doesn't look any different than the hitchhiker. Nice start though
As the others said, not really useful. But your cat sure has some talents.
Yes, once the IVA is done, it's going to hold 6 or so Kerbals and in a horizontal position, so they aren't so dizzy when they go EVA.

Our cats should collaborate. Fluffles here is responsible for all of my concept art.

Nice start, if a bit simple at the moment. How in depth are you planning on taking this?
